mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_users ( username, password, salt, locked ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{locked}, )
INSERT INTO sys_users_roles ( user_id, role_id ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{roleId} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id userId, role_id roleId FROM sys_users_roles WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND role_id = #{roleId}
SELECT id, username, password, organization_code as organizationCode, organization_name as organizationName, salt, locked FROM sys_users WHERE id = #{userId}
SELECT id, username, password, organization_code as organizationCode, organization_name as organizationName, salt, locked FROM sys_users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT role FROM sys_users u, sys_roles r, sys_users_roles ur WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.id=ur.user_id AND r.id=ur.role_id

SELECT permission FROM sys_users u, sys_roles r, sys_permissions p, sys_users_roles ur, sys_roles_permissions rp WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.id=ur.user_id AND r.id=ur.role_id AND p.id=rp.permission_id AND r.id=rp.role_id
